head.citation-title: International Conference on Digital Signal Processing, DSP
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 119 papers. The topics discussed include: hole correction in estimated depth map from single image using color uniformity principle; a blobs detection algorithm based on a simplified form of the fast radial symmetry transform; sequence-guided Siamese neural network for video summarization of unmanned aerial vehicles; how does the brain process mild versus strong violations in music? a pilot study using event-related potentials; two-dimensional cross-correlation for defect detection in composite materials inspected by lock-in thermography; structurally orthogonal finite precision FPGA implementation of block-lifting-based quaternionic paraunitary filter banks for L2L image coding; cascade non-maximally decimated filter banks form efficient variable bandwidth filters for wideband digital transceivers; estimation of sparse equivalent graph filters with limited observations; learning graph structure with stationary graph signals via first-order approximation; a Gaussian process approach for extended object tracking with random shapes and for dealing with intractable likelihoods; multi-step knowledge-aided iterative ESPRIT for direction finding; monaural source separation based on adaptive discriminative criterion in neural networks; an EMD-based micro-Doppler signature analysis for mini-UAV blade flash reconstruction; recursive versions of the reassigned scalogram and of the synchrosqueezed wavelet transform; and instantaneous frequency law tracking using signal's representation in phase diagram domain.
